name: In the Core
description:
In the Core you play as a tiny core slime collecting more cores to become powerful.

---
This is practise game I made when getting to know Construct 3

This game was made as a part of 3 month "game making course" hosted by Luotsaamo 2.0. It is made with Construct 3 to learn the logic behind programming and making visuals for a video game. In spite of all I hope you'll enjoy this game!
